choices.name: Post Affect Survey Thank You
choices.message: Thank you for sharing with your team!
choices.description: This feedback is in response to the user completing the affect survey.

choices.name: Response Time Reminder
choices.description: This feedback is in response to the user starting to type a message to a team member. It is a placeholder for the proposed Typical Response Time (TRT) UI feedback.

choices.name: Call out FAUX Feeling
choices.message: It looks like you’ve expressed a **faux feeling**. {{highlight: word}}
choices.description: This intervention is in response to anything Karuna recognizes as a feeling. It is a placeholder for the proposed NVC element callout UI feedback.

choices.name: Call out Feeling
choices.message: It looks like you’ve expressed **feelings**. {{highlight: word}}
choices.description: This intervention is in response to anything Karuna recognizes as a feeling. It is a placeholder for the proposed NVC element callout UI feedback.

choices.name: Call out Need
choices.message: It looks like you’ve expressed a **need**. {{highlight: word}}
choices.description: This intervention is in response to anything Karuna recognizes as a need. It is a placeholder for the proposed NVC element callout UI feedback.

choices.name: Call out Observation
choices.message: It looks like you’ve made an **observation**. {{highlight: word}}
choices.description: This intervention is in response to anything Karuna recognizes as an observation. It is a placeholder for the proposed NVC element callout UI feedback.

choices.name: Call out Request
choices.message: It looks like you’ve made a **request**. {{highlight: word}}
choices.description: This intervention is in response to anything Karuna recognizes as a request. It is a placeholder for the proposed NVC element callout UI feedback.

choices.name: Call out Multiple NVC
choices.message: You’re using the following **NVC elements**. {{highlight: word, word, word}}
choices.action: multiple NVC elements in a bulleted list
choices.description: This intervention is when Karuna recognizes multiple elements. It is a placeholder for the proposed NVC element callout UI feedback.

choices.name: Affect Survey
choices.message:
Hello! How are you feeling today?

{{affect: input}}
choices.description: Karuna sends this intervention when the user signs into their team to work. The affect survey is prompted.

choices.name: User not open to collaborate
choices.message: {{otherUser1.firstName}}'s status is set to {{otherUser1.status.collaboration}}. They may be unable to meet your request at this time. I invite you to specify when you would like your request to be met.
choices.description: Intervention occurs when the user is making a request of another away/busy user.

choices.name: User is currently typing
choices.message: {{otherUser1.firstName}} is typing a response. I invite you to wait until they send their message before responding.
choices.description: Intervention occurs only after a user types more than x amount of characters, which may indicate they missed or ignored the platform’s own notification.

choices.name: Post-Interaction Survey
choices.message:
How do you feel after the last interaction?

{{affect: input}}
choices.description: This intervention occurs after regardless of another user’s response. The affect survey is prompted.

choices.name: Mediation Steps Reminder
choices.message:
It looks like you’re navigating a sensitive situation. I invite you to consider using the following steps:
1. Make a non-judgmental observation
2. State how you feel about the observation
3. State what you need or value
4. Make a clear request
choices.description: This intervention occurs when the user is typing a message that appears to be in response to or potential for a conflict.

choices.name: Highlight One Word
choices.description: Instruct Karuna to highlight a word in the users message text.

choices.name: Highlight Many Words
choices.description: Instruct Karuna to highlight several words in the users message text.

choices.name: Affect Input Trigger
choices.description: Show a button that triggers the affect survey in the Karuna connect panel.

choices.name: Generic Text Input
choices.description: Display an input box to the user. Response is stored in the user's metadata under 'variable_name'.

choices.name: update other user's user status
choices.description: Display an input box to the user. Response is stored in the user's metadata under 'variable_name'.
